foaf:Person.sql:sqlx: select xmlelement ('http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/:name', wa_utf8_to_wide (u_full_name)), xmlelement ('http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/:nick', wa_utf8_to_wide (u_name)), xmlelement ('http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/:mbox', xmlattributes ('mailto:'||u_e_mail as 'http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#:resource')), xmlelement ('http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/:weblog', xmlattributes (USER_GET_OPTION (u_name, 'URL') as 'http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#:resource')) from sn_person, sys_users where sne_org_id = u_id and sne_id = :sne

select xmlelement ('http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/:knows', xmlelement ('http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/:Person', xmlelement ('http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/:name', wa_utf8_to_wide (u_full_name)), xmlelement ('http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/:nick', wa_utf8_to_wide (u_name)), xmlelement ('http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/:mbox', xmlattributes ('mailto:'||u_e_mail as 'http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#:resource')), xmlelement ('http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/:weblog', xmlattributes (coalesce (USER_GET_OPTION (u_name, 'URL'), '') as 'http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#:resource')) ) ) from ( select u_id,u_full_name,u_name,u_e_mail from sn_person, sn_related, sys_users where sne_org_id = u_id and sne_id = snr_to and snr_from = :sne union select u_id,u_full_name,u_name,u_e_mail from sn_person, sn_related, sys_users where sne_org_id = u_id and sne_id = snr_from and snr_to = :sne ) sub
